forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 40F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low around 45F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.
